catList: This module explores sales management by searching the questions, such as how to analyze sales objectives and strategy,  how to determine the size and organisation of the salesforce, and how to recruit, motivate and evaluate the performance. This module also includes the principles of relationship management, how to develop and nurture relationships with deciders and influencers, and how to design promotion activities in different stages of products. Cases and examples from the pharmaceutical industry are the part of it.
